article.name: Does KnowBe4 Offer the Zensory Toolkit?
article.title: Does KnowBe4 Offer the Zensory Toolkit?
article.body:
KnowBe4 has partnered with The Zensory to guide your employees into a better mindset through a science-backed well-being and productivity toolkit. The Zensory toolkit offers short, high-impact, and focused interventions through binaural beats, nature sounds, interactive touchpad doodles, and breathing cues. Your users can use this toolkit throughout the workday before checking emails, starting presentations, or in between meetings.

This course is not available through the ModStore. To purchase a package, please contact the Zensory team at jasmine@thezensory.com or jade@thezensory.com, or call +44 7961 394461.

images.alt:
This image is a technical specification for a corporate logo or application splash screen, utilizing a vibrant gradient background and minimalistic white line art.

**Dimensions and Background:**
The composition is a square format graphic. The background features a strong vertical color gradient, transitioning from a deep magenta/purple at the top to a bright pink/fuchsia at the bottom.

**Primary Graphic Element (Icon/Glyph):**
Centered in the upper two-thirds of the image is a large, white, continuous line art graphic. This single line forms an abstract profile resembling the letter 'Z'. The top section of the 'Z' incorporates the detailed outline of an eye (eyeball and iris/pupil), and the bottom curve of the 'Z' structure incorporates the outline of a pair of lips. This graphic functions as the brand’s visual identifier.

**Textual Element (Branding/Context):**
Positioned horizontally centered near the bottom of the frame is the brand name:

*   **Text:** THE ZENSORY
*   **Format:** All uppercase, sans-serif typeface (minimalist and modern).
*   **Color:** White.

**Context:** This graphic is designed as a high-contrast visual identity element, optimized for digital display against a saturated color field.
